name: GhostWriter - A collaborative, anonymous, creative writing experiment.
name_original: GhostWriter - A collaborative, anonymous, creative writing experiment.
description:
GhostWriter is a collaborative, anonymous, creative writing experiment.

Anonymous users contribute to creative writing stories one sentence at a time.  After 20 minutes, the user can contribute again.  Each story has it's own timer, so users can bounce around and contribute to other stories as they please.

A user may initiate a story, with parameters like "subject," "rating," and "plot type."  Other users can search for stories using the same parameters.

GhostWriter is a work in progress.  If you have any feedback, I would love to hear it.  Soon, a demo will also be available for iOS.  And if it gains any traction, it will also be put on Steam - where I think it would really shine.  But for now, it is a limited release for Android only so that I can measure database usage.  

To download directly from the Play Store...

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nciv.GhostWriter666
... otherwise, the downloadable .apk here is the same as you would find there.

Thank you!  I hope you enjoy!
